description:
This course is about searching for stocks using an industry index. This course is suitable for all swing traders i.e those traders who buy to hold a stock for more than one day. This course uses a free streaming chart. One of the best chart in USA and Canada.This course is a step by step guide on the search using a chart.Any trader who is looking for a serious way to search for stocks to follow trends will find the real deal search strategy here. 

So if you are a swing trader this course is for you. It is easy and simple in terms of strategy. That's why it is for all the levels.
title: How to Search for Stocks Using Industry Index?
